overview: A River Runs Through It is a cinematographically stunning true story of Norman Maclean. The story follows Norman and his brother Paul through the experiences of life and growing up, and how their love of fly fishing keeps them together despite varying life circumstances in the untamed west of Montana in the 1920s.
tagline: The Story of an American Family.
cast: Craig Sheffer|Brad Pitt|Tom Skerritt|Brenda Blethyn|Edie McClurg
